sourcesContent: import { useState } from 'react'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; function ServiEditNote({ values, cerrarModal, reload, reloadModal }) { const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [notaAdded, setNotaAdded] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = ()=>{ console.log(values) } return( <> ) } export default ServiEditNote;
